bibl.title: Report on the Excavations at Abu Mina in Autumn 1991.
Bulletin de la Société d'Archéologie copte

bibl.note: The most important operation was the search for the remaining traces of the southern fortification wall of the town. The excavation of the so-called "Ostraca-House" was continued in search of further ostraca. Nearly all the ostraca are written in Greek (publication in preparation by Georgina ROBINSON-FANTONI).
GROSSMANN Peter and Jacek KOSCIUK, Report on the Excavations at Abu Mina in Autumn 1991.
Bulletin de la Société d'Archéologie copte 32 (1993) pp. 73-84, 5 figg. et pll. I-III.
